# Self Hosted Runner Configuration for HCN GitHub Actions

This document provides documentation on which jobs are allocated to which self-hosted runners in the HCN GitHub Actions setup.

## Current Self-Hosted Runners

|                Runner Name                | Description | Test Groups |
|-------------------------------------------|-------------|-------------|
| hiero-network-node-linux-large            |             |             |
| hiero-network-node-linux-medium           |             |             |
| hiero-network-node-linux-small-scheduler  |             |             |
| hiero-network-node-linux-debian-12-large  |             |             |
| hiero-network-node-linux-debian-12-medium |             |             |
| hiero-network-node-linux-ubuntu-24-large  |             |             |
| hiero-network-node-linux-ubuntu-24-medium |             |             |
| hiero-otter-linux-large                   |             |             |
| hiero-citr-linux-large                    |             |             |
| hiero-citr-linux-medium                   |             |             |
| hiero-citr-linux-small                    |             |             |

# Proposed Self-Hosted Runners

|           Runner Name            | Description | Test Groups |
|----------------------------------|-------------|-------------|
| hcn-regression-linux-large       |             |             |
| hcn-timing-sensitive-linux-large |             |             |
| hcn-time-consuming-linux-large   |             |             |
| hcn-hammer-linux-large           |             |             |
| hcn-hapi-linux-large             |             |             |
| hcn-otter-linux-large            |             |             |
| hcn-jrs-linux-large              |             |             |
| hcn-snyk-linux-medium            |             |             |
